item.title: Ryzen and Linux is a disaster (2017)
item.description: If you are reading this blog post in 2018 or later, chances are that AMD has fixed all Linux issues. But that was not the case months after launch in 2017. Also, I work at Red Hat, these lines are solely my own opinion blah blah. Let’s start, shall we? Ryzen 7 series was introduced early March 2017, I bought parts for my Ryzen workstation beginning June 2017 thinking that few months will allow AMD to settle down and release necessary BIOS updates and CPU microcode upgrade.
